overview: Following a tumultuous time as her partner Jonathan leaves to enlist in the military, Olivia moves on to a new chapter in her life and returns to the thing that has always supported her; burlesque. Whilst re-kindling her love for erotic dance and focusing on the business that she owns with her ex-husband Kitts, Olivia rediscovers her passions and her heart's desire.
title: A Burlesque Story
